commit message:
Merge pull request #34 from strk/readme

Fix markdown

Merge pull request #36 from brarcher/gradle-wrappers

Add wrapper scripts for gradle

Replace usage of AutoCompleteTextView with EditText

At one point the intention was to store the last used options
for these fields and populate the AutoCompleteTextView with
entries. However, this is going to be dropped for now, and the
entries provided by the EditText will be used.
Update gradle version used in wrapper to 2.10
Use gradlew to build on travis

Merge pull request #37 from brarcher/no-custom-autocomplete

No custom autocomplete
Display expected Toast if IOException occurs

Add an About dialog

The about dialog layout is borrowed from K-9 Mail:
https://github.com/k9mail

German translations provided by paulle.

Merge pull request #38 from brarcher/about

Add an About dialog
Remove unnecessary Toast when adding Budget
Add ability to share receipt images

Merge pull request #39 from brarcher/share-receipt

Add ability to share a receipt image

Update for release v0.5
